column4: hello, i need help with a secondary installation of ubuntu. lucid is currently installed and going to try out natty as secondary. i chose the "alongside" option in natty installer and it installed automatically to an empty partition but included its own /boot dir, how do i properly migrate the kernels in the second install to the main grub bootloader that is already on the lucid install?
and i suppose remove grub from the second install too...because i imagine it will try to manage itself
in theory.. :) the 2nd ubuntu install should see the first and take over grub and setup menus to boot either one.
hmm thats the thing, it's not in the grub boot menu at all :(
